# AncestralClust Test Configuration File
# Used for integration testing of performance logging system

# Performance monitoring settings
performance_enabled=1
performance_granularity=medium
performance_output_format=csv
performance_track_memory=1
performance_track_cpu=1
performance_track_threads=1
performance_flush_immediately=0

# Algorithm parameters for testing
max_iterations=10
convergence_threshold=0.001
thread_count=2

# Output settings
verbose_output=0
debug_mode=0
